custom-sql.sql: SELECT User_.userId AS userId, User_.screenName AS screenName, User_.firstName AS firstName, User_.middleName AS middleName, User_.lastName AS lastName, lims_settings.status AS status FROM lims_settings INNER JOIN User_ ON (User_.userId = lims_settings.userId) WHERE (User_.userId != ?) ORDER BY User_.firstName ASC, User_.middleName ASC, User_.lastName ASC
